name: TWO IS BETTER THAN ONE!!
description:
"I'll take two!"  Keep a box for you and treat a friend to a box of cookies by both team Tasty Treats and Delicious Crumbs.  Enjoy the first place winning Double Chocolate Oatmeal cookies along with a box of Holiday Snickerdoodles.  Double chocolate oatmeal cookies are made with old fashioned oats baked with milk chocolate chips inside and white chocolate drizzle on top.  Snickerdoodles are baked with a hint of cinnamon then topped with red holiday sugar sprinkles.  Perfect for corporate gifts and for friends and loved ones.

Special thanks to Project 116 volunteers Catherine Hojnowski and Crystal Horton for guiding their teams to the top!

TWO BOXES OF 6 COOKIES EACH
- individually wrapped
- gift box/tin included with recipes
- baked in Brooklyn by Tasty Morsels Bakery

name: SNICKERDOODLE
description:
Coming in at a close second, take home a box of our second place winner - Holiday Snickerdoodles created by team Delicious Crumbs.  A snickerdoodle that's no laughing matter, this winning cookie has a hint of cinnamon and is topped with red holiday sugar sprinkles.  Perfect for the holiday season!

Special thanks to Project 116 volunteer Crystal Horton for leading her team to a strong 2nd place finish!

BOX OF 6 COOKIES
- individually wrapped
- gift box/tin included with recipes
- baked in Brooklyn by Tasty Morsels Bakery

name: DOUBLE CHOCOLATE OATMEAL
description:
Enjoy a box of the first place winning cookie created by team Tasty Treats.  These Double Chocolate Oatmeal cookies will remind you of your Grandmother's special recipe - oatmeal baked with milk chocolate chips with white chocolate drizzled on top.  You'll taste why this won the blue ribbon in our Project 116 Cookie Competition!

Shout out to Project 116 volunteer Catherine Hojnowski for leading her team to victory.

BOX OF 6 COOKIES
- individually wrapped
- gift box/tin included with recipes
- baked in Brooklyn by Tasty Morsels Bakery
